meta.name: description
meta.content: this is the home page of the Mexico Academy & Central School District. this page features announcements, news articles, upcoming events, sources for parents, students and community

Read the full story >>","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37830&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"View a compilation of Frequently Asked Questions","src":"Mexico675x400_ImportantInfo2.jpg?rnd=0.676052489632765","caption":"We have put together a running list of common questions we've received throughout the past few weeks.","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/Page/928","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Gallery: Class of 2020 trading cards","src":"Mexico675x400_TradeCards.jpg?rnd=0.759547223690686","caption":"Check out a gallery of virtual trading cards featuring the MACS Class of 2020 >>","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37825&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Video: Feeling isolated, lonely? County officials want to help","src":"Mexico675x400_ImportantInfo.jpg?rnd=0.984356231980192","caption":"During a recent video conference, officials discussed the hundreds of people locally and statewide who are available to help you and your families get through this crisis.","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37799&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Cheerleaders compete at state competition","src":"CheerleadingStatesforWEB.jpg?rnd=0.581967331740059","caption":"The varsity cheerleading team competed in Rochester at the state competition, just the second time in program history the Tigers have earned a spot. Learn more >>","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37704&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Drama Club stages 'Mamma Mia' as spring musical","src":"MammaMiaforWEB.jpg?rnd=0.291014262144926","caption":"The hit-laden classic that features music based on songs from Abba will be performed on Thursday, Friday and Saturday at 7 p.m. in the high school auditorium. We hope to see you there!","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37703&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Students deliver sweet treats to St. Francis residents","src":"StFrancisvisitforWEB.jpg?rnd=0.222560661017224","caption":"High school students spread the love with St. Francis Commons residents as they delivered handwritten Valentine’s Day cards and heart-shaped brownies.","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37690&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Class of 2020's Top 10 students announced","src":"Mexico675x400_Top10.jpg?rnd=0.0728114936839843","caption":"The top 10 seniors in the Mexico High School Class of 2020 have been unveiled.","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37688&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Middle School celebrates True Beauty Day","src":"TrueBeautyMMSforWEB.jpg?rnd=0.041232872773536","caption":"True Beauty Day focuses on the belief that beauty is more than just what someone looks like and showcasing all the unique traits that make up the whole person. View a video from the event >","pause":"","link":"https://www.mexicocsd.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=858&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=37687&PageID=1","target":"_self"}]}}

a.aria-label: Graphic depicting the words Kindness Can't Be Quarantined Image

img.alt: Graphic depicting the words Kindness Can't Be Quarantined

a.span: Student writes: Kindness can't be Quarantined

p.span: An eighth-grade Middle School student shared a moving story about kindness and helping each other through difficult times.

a.title: Go to comments for Student writes: Kindness can't be Quarantined

a.aria-label: A graphic displaying some of the Senior 2020 trading cards Image

img.alt: A graphic displaying some of the Senior 2020 trading cards

a.span: Gallery: View our senior trading cards

p.span: Seniors submitted information and photos, and each received a personalized trading card.

a.title: Go to comments for Gallery: View our senior trading cards

a.span: County officials: Hundreds ready to talk

p.span: Officials discussed recently the hundreds of people locally and statewide who are available to help you and your families get through this crisis.

a.title: Go to comments for County officials: Hundreds ready to talk

a.aria-label: Pictured with Coach Stephanie Moretti is the Mexico varsity cheerleading team on Feb. 28, 2020. Image

img.alt: Pictured with Coach Stephanie Moretti is the Mexico varsity cheerleading team on Feb. 28, 2020.

a.span: Cheerleading team competes at state competition

p.span: It was the second time ever the Tigers, who competed March 7, reached the state's top cheerleading competition.

a.title: Go to comments for Cheerleading team competes at state competition

a.span: MACS performs 'Mamma Mia!' as spring musical

p.span: The show ran three nights with strong attendance each night to see the fun, upbeat, hit-laden classic.

a.title: Go to comments for MACS performs 'Mamma Mia!' as spring musical

a.aria-label: Students socialize with residents of St. Francis Commons in Oswego. Image

img.alt: Students socialize with residents of St. Francis Commons in Oswego.

a.span: Students deliver treats to assisted living facility

p.span: Students from a class at Mexico High School helped spread the love with St. Francis Commons residents as they delivered handwritten Valentine’s Day cards and heart-shaped brownies.

a.title: Go to comments for Students deliver treats to assisted living facility

a.aria-label: Pictured is a graphic featuring the top 10 students in the MACS Class of 2020. Image

img.alt: Pictured is a graphic featuring the top 10 students in the MACS Class of 2020.

p.span: The top 10 seniors in the Mexico High School Class of 2020 have been unveiled.

a.title: Go to comments for Class of 2020's Top 10 students announced
